languages.text: {n}После Анатомической оперы у вас нет ни малейшего сомнения в предназначении устройств рядом с вами. Некоторые вы, кажется, видели в лаборатории гемункула. Другие выглядят еще более непонятно, но сверкающие иглы, режущие кромки и трубки и колбы с тошнотворного вида жидкостями внутри прозрачно намекают на ужасы, которые они способны сотворить с живым телом.{/n}

{n}After the Anatomical Opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}После Анатомической оперы у вас нет ни малейшего сомнения в предназначении устройств рядом с вами. Некоторые вы, кажется, видели в лаборатории гемункула. Другие выглядят еще более непонятно, но сверкающие иглы, режущие кромки и трубки и колбы с тошнотворного вида жидкостями внутри прозрачно намекают на ужасы, которые они способны сотворить с живым телом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After the anatomical opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

{n}After the anatomical opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

{n}After the Anatomical Opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你已经见识过了解剖歌剧院里的景象，非常清楚身边这些装置都是干什么的。其中一部分，你之前在血伶人的实验室里见过，而其他装置的设计风格则更加隐晦，但它们闪闪发光的针头、切割用的刀片，以及各种各样装满恶臭液体的试管与烧瓶，清楚地表明这些刑具可以为活人带来何种程度的恐怖。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the Anatomical Opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你已经见识过了解剖歌剧院里的景象，非常清楚身边这些装置都是干什么的。其中一部分，你之前在血伶人的实验室里见过，而其他装置的设计风格则更加隐晦，但它们闪闪发光的针头、切割用的刀片，以及各种各样装满恶臭液体的试管与烧瓶，清楚地表明这些刑具可以为活人带来何种程度的恐怖。{/n}

languages.text: {n}まるで解剖がテーマのオペラを鑑賞したかのように、周辺にある器具の目的がハッキリ分かってきた。中には、以前にハモンキュラスの研究室で見たことがあるものもある。他の器具は余計によく分からないデザインだが、光る針、切断刃、そして気持ちの悪い液体が入った管やフラスコは、それが生きた生物にどんな恐怖を与えるのか、ありありと感じ取れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the Anatomical Opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}まるで解剖がテーマのオペラを鑑賞したかのように、周辺にある器具の目的がハッキリ分かってきた。中には、以前にハモンキュラスの研究室で見たことがあるものもある。他の器具は余計によく分からないデザインだが、光る針、切断刃、そして気持ちの悪い液体が入った管やフラスコは、それが生きた生物にどんな恐怖を与えるのか、ありありと感じ取れる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Después de la ópera anatómica, no te cabe la menor duda del propósito de los instrumentos que te rodean. Crees haber visto algunos antes, en el laboratorio del Hemónculo. Otros presentan diseños aún más ignotos, pero las relucientes agujas, cuchillas, probetas y frascos llenos de repugnantes fluidos evocan una vívida imagen de los horrores que pueden infligir a un ser vivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the Anatomical Opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de la ópera anatómica, no te cabe la menor duda del propósito de los instrumentos que te rodean. Crees haber visto algunos antes, en el laboratorio del Hemónculo. Otros presentan diseños aún más ignotos, pero las relucientes agujas, cuchillas, probetas y frascos llenos de repugnantes fluidos evocan una vívida imagen de los horrores que pueden infligir a un ser vivo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après votre passage à l'Opéra anatomique, vous n'avez pas le moindre doute quant à la vocation des appareils qui vous entourent. D'ailleurs, il vous semble en avoir déjà vu un certain nombre dans le laboratoire de l'hémoncule. Quant aux autres, si leur conception est encore plus obscure, les aiguilles étincelantes, les lames acérées et cette débauche de fioles et de tubes remplis de fluides obscènes sont une indication évidente des horreurs qu'ils peuvent infliger à un organisme vivant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the Anatomical Opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après votre passage à l'Opéra anatomique, vous n'avez pas le moindre doute quant à la vocation des appareils qui vous entourent. D'ailleurs, il vous semble en avoir déjà vu un certain nombre dans le laboratoire de l'hémoncule. Quant aux autres, si leur conception est encore plus obscure, les aiguilles étincelantes, les lames acérées et cette débauche de fioles et de tubes remplis de fluides obscènes sont une indication évidente des horreurs qu'ils peuvent infliger à un organisme vivant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach der Anatomischen Oper bleibt bei dir nicht der geringste Zweifel, was der Zweck dieser Geräte ist. Du glaubst, dass du im Laboratorium des Haemonculus solche schon mal gesehen hast. Andere wiederum sind in ihrem Design noch obskurer, aber die glänzenden Nadeln, Schneidblätter und mit abstoßenden Flüssigkeiten gefüllten Schläuche und Fläschchen lassen die Gräuel erahnen, die einem lebendigen Körper damit angetan werden können.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the Anatomical Opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach der Anatomischen Oper bleibt bei dir nicht der geringste Zweifel, was der Zweck dieser Geräte ist. Du glaubst, dass du im Laboratorium des Haemonculus solche schon mal gesehen hast. Andere wiederum sind in ihrem Design noch obskurer, aber die glänzenden Nadeln, Schneidblätter und mit abstoßenden Flüssigkeiten gefüllten Schläuche und Fläschchen lassen die Gräuel erahnen, die einem lebendigen Körper damit angetan werden können.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Anatomi Operası'nın ardından etrafını saran cihazların amacına dair en ufak bir şüphen kalmıyor. Bazılarını Haimonkulus'un laboratuvarında gördüğünü düşünüyorsun. Diğerlerinin tasarımları daha muğlak olsa da parıldayan iğneler, keskin bıçaklar ve tiksindirici sıvılarla dolu tüpler ile kaplar, canlı bir bedende yaratabilecekleri dehşetlerin açık birer göstergesi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the Anatomical Opera, you have not the slightest doubt about the purpose of the devices around you. You think you have seen some of them before, in the Haemonculus's laboratory. Others are even more obscure in their design, but the gleaming needles, cutting blades, and tubes and flasks filled with revolting liquids give a clear indication of the horrors they can wreak upon a living body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Anatomi Operası'nın ardından etrafını saran cihazların amacına dair en ufak bir şüphen kalmıyor. Bazılarını Haimonkulus'un laboratuvarında gördüğünü düşünüyorsun. Diğerlerinin tasarımları daha muğlak olsa da parıldayan iğneler, keskin bıçaklar ve tiksindirici sıvılarla dolu tüpler ile kaplar, canlı bir bedende yaratabilecekleri dehşetlerin açık birer göstergesi.{/n}
